summary: Both previously identified issues have been addressed with safe handling of unknown tiers and unconditional sovereign veto enforcement, with no new blocking problems introduced.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Unknown or missing tiers default to weight=1, granting unintended voting power
previous_issues_status.notes: resolveConvictionWeight now returns 0 for missing/unknown tiers and clamps to finite non-negative weights.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Sovereign veto only applied when weight > 0; NaN/Infinity/negative weights could corrupt totals
previous_issues_status.notes: Sovereign veto is set regardless of weight, and weights are sanitized to finite non-negative values; voter count matches sanitized weights.
